/usr/bin/c++   -std=c++17 -Wall -fopenmp  -Wl,-rpath,$ORIGIN -fcilkplus -lcilkrts -DCILK -O3 -DNDEBUG -O3 -g   CMakeFiles/gen_updated.dir/examples/analytical_apps/flags.cc.o CMakeFiles/gen_updated.dir/examples/analytical_apps/gen_updated.cc.o  -o gen_updated -Wl,-rpath,/home/yaof/geograph/datu/build:/usr/local/openmpi/lib:/usr/local/lib libgrape-lite.so /usr/local/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so /usr/local/lib/libglog.so /usr/local/lib/libgflags.so -ldl -lpthread /usr/local/lib/libglog.so
